snippet: Can spectator antics sometimes get in the way of the game? Or should everything and anything be allowed as long as it isn’t mean-spirited or offensive, or actual fan interference?
abstract: Can spectator antics sometimes get in the way of the game? Or should everything and anything be allowed as long as it isn’t mean-spirited or offensive, or actual fan interference?

headline.main: How Much Should Fans Be Allowed to Distract Opposing Teams?
